title: Sullivan-Brown lands BC
text: That's according to this video featuring Sullivan-Brown talking to Mid-Atlantic regional analyst Adam Friedman.Bear in mind that was before BC offered, and it's still very early.Here's the really good news: Sullivan-Brown, in the video linked above, plans to visit Boston College in the near future. So he's clearly demonstrating an openness to the Eagles.Sullivan-Brown's film is impressive. He's big enough to play outside receiver but is probably explosive enough and has good enough elusiveness and hands to play in the slot as well.The '17 receiver shows really good ball skills and does a great job of playing the ball in the air. FEATURED PRODUCT
